name: amo-up-top-version-info
description: Include version information about an AMO add-on in the summary box. The version information is highlighted in a blue box. You can set the color theme below to one of "Red", "Green", "Gray", "Orange" or "Blue". If the theme is blank, has an illegal value, or the add-on's theme support is broken (as it is now), the theme will default to "Orange".
